医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 大流行期间饮食失调和自残诊断激增：迫切需要干预研究人员检查了 COVID-19 大流行后饮食失调和自残的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Eating-disorder-and-self-harm-diagnosis-surged-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-an-urgent-need-for-intervention。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Eating-disorder-and-self-harm-diagnosis-surged-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-an-urgent-need-for-intervention。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c98b62c-2768-40e6-a54f-7075029a8508 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 04:11:00 -0400 Eating disorder and self-harm diagnosis surged during the COVID-19 pandemic: an urgent need for intervention
细胞和基因治疗 CDMO Andelyn Biosciences 开设占地 180,000 平方英尺的新制造总部，庆祝 20 多年的领导力和创新能力Andelyn Biosciences 是细胞和基因疗法开发和制造的先驱，今天正式落成其新的制造总部，即位于俄亥俄州哥伦布创新区的 Andelyn 企业中心 (ACC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Cell-and-gene-therapy-CDMO-Andelyn-Biosciences-celebrates-over-20-years-of-leadership-and-innovation-with-opening- of-new-180000-square-foot-manufacturing-headquarters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Cell-and-gene-therapy-CDMO-Andelyn-Biosciences-celebrates-over-20-years-of-leadership-and-innovation-with-opening- of-new-180000-square-foot-manufacturing-headquarters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6baed0b-1913-47ed-9f5f-a4b41731e6b4 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 02:32:00 -0400 Cell and gene therapy CDMO Andelyn Biosciences celebrates over 20 years of leadership and innovation with opening of new 180,000 square foot manufacturing headquarters
通过全息术和深度学习实现的新型快速自动化病毒斑块检测系统在《自然生物医学工程》上发表的一篇新论文中，由加州大学洛杉矶分校电气与计算机工程系 Aydogan Ozcan 教授和加州纳米系统研究所副所长领导的科学家团队开发了一种快速、免染色、自动化的病毒斑块通过全息术和深度学习实现的检测系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-rapid-automated-viral-plaque-detection-system-enabled-by-holography-and-deep-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-rapid-automated-viral-plaque-detection-system-enabled-by-holography-and-deep-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68b226ed-7bac-4046-b5ac-7469fc4bf81c Fri, 23 Jun 2023 01:30:03 -0400 New rapid automated viral plaque detection system enabled by holography and deep learning
研究发现老年多发性硬化症患者在停止治疗后存在活动性疾病复发的风险今天发表在《柳叶刀神经病学》杂志上的一篇文章评估了老年多发性硬化症患者在停止疾病修饰治疗后活动性疾病复发的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-finds-the-risk-of-recurrence-of-active-disease-in-older-患者-with-MS-after-discontinuing-therapy。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-finds-the-risk-of-recurrence-of-active-disease-in-older-患者-with-MS-after-discontinuing-therapy。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7856a3b-ad17-4ed5-8c29-551401b9c80f Fri, 23 Jun 2023 01:26:47 -0400 Study finds the risk of recurrence of active disease in older patients with MS after discontinuing therapy
研究发现，甲型流感产生的关键病毒蛋白可以粉碎宿主细胞的遗传物质甲型流感是每年流感季节造成代价高昂的两种流感病毒之一，对人类和许多其他动物几乎持续构成威胁。它还引发了偶尔发生的流行病，比如 1918 年的那场流行病，导致数百万人死亡，并对卫生系统和更广泛的社会造成严重破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Key-viral- Protein- Produced-by-influenza-A-can-shred-a-host-cells-genic-materials-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Key-viral- Protein- Produced-by-influenza-A-can-shred-a-host-cells-genic-materials-finds-study.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=620e4296-93aa-41a8-9d0c-b7e3d9db3534 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 01:20:43 -0400 Key viral protein produced by influenza A can shred a host cell's genetic materials, finds study
研究发现，母亲体重指数较高的女性母乳喂养时间较短母乳喂养对孕产妇和儿童的健康都有显着的好处。研究表明，体重指数 (BMI) 较高的女性母乳喂养时间较短，但尚未确定其潜在机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Women-with-higher-maternal-BMI-have-shorter-breastfeeding-duration-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Women-with-higher-maternal-BMI-have-shorter-breastfeeding-duration-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cce6f71-ce2d-43a9-af21-de4f022e52ed Fri, 23 Jun 2023 00:42:39 -0400 Women with higher maternal BMI have shorter breastfeeding duration, finds study
使用高静水压分析人类 tRNA 的构象动力学正如太空蕴藏着无限的奥秘一样，当我们放大到生物分子的水平（比一米小一万亿倍）时，仍然有很多东西需要学习。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Analyzing-the-conformational-dynamics-of-a- human-tRNA-using-high-Hydrostatic-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Analyzing-the-conformational-dynamics-of-a- human-tRNA-using-high-Hydrostatic-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b033ef3-bd73-40dd-aeda-6a698afd7130 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 00:28:23 -0400 Analyzing the conformational dynamics of a human tRNA using high hydrostatic pressure
绘制与心血管疾病相关的细菌加工氨基酸的副产物克利夫兰诊所的一个研究小组最近在《欧洲心脏杂志》上发表了与心血管疾病相关的代谢物“图谱”。这些新发现提供了有关细菌和代谢副产品、代谢物所采取的路线和潜在分支路径的关键细节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Mapping-the-by-products-of-bacteria-processing-amino-acids-linked-with-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Mapping-the-by-products-of-bacteria-processing-amino-acids-linked-with-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d914ea3-8986-4097-bba1-a5c63bf2cdd8 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 00:24:24 -0400 Mapping the by-products of bacteria processing amino acids associated with cardiovascular disease
PMC 将为 NFL 球员改善潜在的替代疼痛管理治疗美国国家橄榄球联盟 (National Football League) 和 NFL 球员协会 (NFLPA) 今天宣布，他们将向埃默里大学的研究人员提供一笔资助，用于研究创新的、同类首创的替代性疼痛管理方法，这些方法可以造福 NFL 球员和整个社会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/PMC-to-improve-pottial-alternative-pain-management-treatments-for-NFL-players.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/PMC-to-improve-pottial-alternative-pain-management-treatments-for-NFL-players.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c2e9ff-35d3-407b-82da-9435059df78b Fri, 23 Jun 2023 00:10:08 -0400 PMC to improve potential alternative pain management treatments for NFL players
破译生化机制解释蛋白质工厂的中心根据遗传蓝图，单个氨基酸在我们细胞的蛋白质工厂（核糖体）中组装成长氨基酸链（蛋白质）。每个新形成的蛋白质都以氨基酸蛋氨酸开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Deciphering-a-biochemical-mechanism-explains-the-center-of- Protein-factories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Deciphering-a-biochemical-mechanism-explains-the-center-of- Protein-factories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab9eba74-6482-44af-b6b9-df4c05f1b629 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 00:05:13 -0400 Deciphering a biochemical mechanism explains the center of protein factories
